name: CVE-2019-20446
description: In xml.rs in GNOME librsvg before 2.46.2, a crafted SVG file with nested patterns can cause denial of service when passed to the library for processing. The attacker constructs pattern elements so that the number of final rendered objects grows exponentially.
pattern: [(software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:gnome:librsvg:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:gnome:librsvg:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:gnome:librsvg:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*') OR (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:opensuse:leap:15.1:*:*:*:*:*:*:*') OR (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:fedoraproject:fedora:30:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:fedoraproject:fedora:31:*:*:*:*:*:*:*') OR (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:debian:debian_linux:9.0:*:*:*:*:*:*:*') OR (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:canonical:ubuntu_linux:16.04:*:*:*:lts:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:canonical:ubuntu_linux:18.04:*:*:*:lts:*:*:*')]

external_references.description: This object was created using cve2stix from the Signals Corps.
